solution_line_template: He installs {base_cabinets_per_counter_initial}*{multiplier_twice}=<<{base_cabinets_per_counter_initial}*{multiplier_twice}={cabinets_per_new_counter}>>{cabinets_per_new_counter} cabinets over each counter

So he installs {cabinets_per_new_counter}*{num_different_counters}=<<{cabinets_per_new_counter}*{num_different_counters}={total_cabinets_over_new_counters}>>{total_cabinets_over_new_counters} cabinets over counters

That means he installed a total of {total_cabinets_over_new_counters}+{additional_cabinets_installed}=<<{total_cabinets_over_new_counters}+{additional_cabinets_installed}={total_cabinets_installed_this_time}>>{total_cabinets_installed_this_time} cabinets
